cause.description:
MEIR PANIM'S EMERGENCY SDEROT RELIEF CAMPAIGN:
1. Hundreds of meals are provided in the Sderot soup kitchen.
2. Hot, nutritious meals are delivered to home-bound elderly and disabled.
3. Bullet-proof vans deliver vital meals to children and families who must remain in bomb shelters.
4. Candies, treats, and games are distributed to children who are engulfed by fear in bomb shelters to help alleviate their constant fear.
5. Furniture is delivered to victims of rocket attacks.
FACT: Sderot is especially prone and vulnerable to daily rocket attacks. In this time of need, EVERY PENNY COUNTS!
Please support Meir Panim's Emergency Sderot Relief Campaign.
Zev Nevo, Project Director American Friends of Meir Panim
